ID |blank1_info = 1267309 |website = |footnotes = }} Canova is a town in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Miner County, and 89 people lived there at the 2020 census. Canova became a town in 1898. ==References== Category:Towns in South Dakota Category:1898 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in South Dakota
